name: MANN+HUMMEL
goal: MANN+HUMMEL ist Weltmarktführer auf dem Gebiet der Filtration. Von der Automobilerstausrüstung bis zum Innenraum-Luftfilter für Museen, Operationssälen und Flughäfen - unser Ziel ist, das Schädliche vom Nützlichen zu trennen.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Public Health, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Directive 2008/50/EC on ambient air quality and cleaner air for Europe including the following elements:
The merging of most of existing legislation into a single directive (except for the Fourth Daughter Directive) with no change to existing air quality objectives.
New air quality objectives for PM2.5 (fine particles) including the limit value and exposure related objectives.
